## Solicitation Notice: Electrical Services - AGASSIZ Research and Development Centre

### Reference Information

* Solicitation Number: 01R11-24-C015
* Amendment Number: 1
* Reference Number: cb-7256-32555510
* Amendment Date: 2023-08-24
* Publication Date: 2023-07-14
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-08-24T13:00:00

### Notice Description

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada’s Agassiz Research and Development Centre at 6947 Highway 7, Agassiz, BC, requires a contractor to provide electrical maintenance services on an as-and-when-requested basis. The centre is seeking a contractor to establish a contract with task authorizations for the delivery of the requirement detailed in the notice, to the identified users.

The period of the contract will be for one (1) calendar year with the possibility to extend the contract for three (3) additional one-year periods. The anticipated start date is October 1, 2023.

### Mandatory Technical Requirements

* Security Requirements: Contractor personnel requiring access to sensitive work sites must hold a valid Reliability Status.
* Mandatory Site Visit: It is recommended that the Bidder or a representative visit the work site on August 3, 2023, at 10:00 am PDT. Bidders must communicate with the Site Authority by August 2, 2023, to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend.
* Basis of Selection: A bid must comply with the requirements of the notice and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive.

### Notice Details

* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Category: SRV
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Notice Status: Expired
* Regions of Opportunity: Unspecified
* Regions of Delivery: British Columbia
* Trade Agreements: Canada has adopted various trade agreements, including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).
* Procuring Office: Natalie O’Neill, Contracting Specialist, Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
* Contact Information:
  - Phone: (306) 807-8740
  - Email: natalie.oneill@agr.gc.ca
  - Fax: N/A

### Bid Submissions

Bids shall be submitted using the CPC Connect service
